channel.title: wordpress on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in wordpress on My New Hugo Site

item.title: How to transfer a Wordpress site from one domain to another?
item.description: Explanation Other than uploading your wordpress sites to the new domain, you will need to do some changes in your database. Therefore, when you want to move the wordpress website to a new domain, you will find out that existing database records are still pointing at the old domain. So how do we properly migrate our wordpress site to the new domain name? I have seen a lot of developers going straight to the database and updating records to a new domain.
